messages.message: There is no documentation folder in the representation folder 733dc055-34be-4260-85c7-5549a7083031/representations/rep1.
Doesn't have files in metadata/descriptive folder but have dmdSec in 733dc055-34be-4260-85c7-5549a7083031/representations/rep1/METS.xml; Put the files under metadata folder

Individual representations should state their specific rights in their representation METS file (733dc055-34be-4260-85c7-5549a7083031/representations/rep1/METS.xml) Individual representations should state their specific rights in their representation METS file (Root METS.xml)
